answers.answer: Hey Alyson!You could possibly find about the Juvenile Diabetes support groups and upcoming events in your area by contacting you doctors office. MedHelp also has regular online events and health discussions. You could view it under health chats or possibly contact one of the moderators in the MedHelp Suggestions forum.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: I would like to go to a support group. My 15 year old son was diagnosed last week.  I would also like to volunteer and find out about all upcoming events.Alyson
title: newly diagnosed teenager
